title: Are the Nolas Rooting for Austin’s Padres or Aaron’s Phillies in the NLCS?
description: San Diego’s Austin Nola delivered a huge hit against Philadelphia’s Aaron Nola in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S. For their nervous (and well-traveled) parents, that was good and bad.
dc:creator: Scott Miller
media:credit: Scott Miller for The New York Times
media:description: A.J. and Stacie Nola have been traveling all over the country to support their sons. Aaron Nola (Phillies) and his older brother Austin (Padres) are facing off in the National League Championship Series.
